name: Mt. Pine
description:
Help a little pinecone climb a mountain, while planting trees and plants on your way up!

Made in 2 weeks for RE: Game Jam Online VI for the RE: GameDev group:  https://itch.io/profile/re-gamedev

Game jam theme was "Multiple Generations"


Credits:

Brandon Orden - 3D/2D Art

Sean Cunnington - Programming

Gamil Texidor - Programming

Pete Jones - Programming

Emma Sanders - Music/Sound
